description.value: CodeSystem for the eRS Review Outcome

display.value: A service has reviewed the referral and cancelled an upcoming patient encounter, with the intent of arranging a different patient encounter at a future date
The Provider has converted an Advice and Guidance Request into a Referral, accepting the responsibility to refer it
A Service has passed the Referral back to the Referrer with some advice
A Service has accepted the Referral will arrange an appointment for the Patient later
